mapper.select: select LONG_ from ACT_RU_VARIABLE where NAME_='nrOfActiveInstances' and PROC_INST_ID_= #{proInstId}

select ac.id,it.institutionname,to_char(to_date(ac.term,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') as term,rt.templatename from account ac INNER JOIN INSTITUTION it on AC.INSTITUTION_ID=it.id INNER JOIN ReportTemplate rt ON ac.ACCOUNTTEMPLATE_ID=rt.id where ac.accountstate=2
and to_char(to_date(ac.term,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{term}
and rt.templatename like concat(concat('%',#{templateName}),'%')
and it.institutionname like concat(concat('%',#{institutionname}),'%')
order by ac.id

select ac.id,it.institutionname,to_char(to_date(ac.term,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') as term,ap.templatename from account ac INNER JOIN INSTITUTION it on AC.INSTITUTION_ID=it.id INNER JOIN reporttemplate ap ON ac.ACCOUNTTEMPLATE_ID=ap.id where ac.accountstate=2
and to_char(to_date(ac.term,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{term}
and ap.templatename like concat(concat('%',#{templateName}),'%')
and it.institutionname like concat(concat('%',#{institutionname}),'%')
order by ac.id

select count(*) from ( select ac.id,it.institutionname,to_char(to_date(ac.term,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') as term,ap.templatename from account ac INNER JOIN INSTITUTION it on AC.INSTITUTION_ID=it.id INNER JOIN reporttemplate ap ON ac.ACCOUNTTEMPLATE_ID=ap.id where ac.accountstate=2
and to_char(to_date(ac.term,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{term}
and ap.templatename like concat(concat('%',#{templateName}),'%')
and it.institutionname like concat(concat('%',#{institutionname}),'%')
order by ac.id )a
